price: Al'amarin Allah yã zo, sabõda haka kada ku nẽmi hanzartãwarsa. Tsarkin Allah ya tabbata, kuma Ya ɗaukaka daga abin da suke yi na shirka.
arabic: أَتَىٰٓ أَمۡرُ ٱللَّهِ فَلَا تَسۡتَعۡجِلُوهُۚ سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥ وَتَعَٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: atā amru al-lahi falā tastaʿjilūhu sub'ḥānahu wataʿālā ʿammā yush'rikūna
